Components¶

discord.ActionRow(*args, **kwargs)¶

Represents an ActionRow-Part for the components of an discord.Message

Attributes¶

  • *args: [Union[Button, SelectionMenu]]

    An array of :class:`Button`(s) and/or :class:`SelectionMenu`(s).

  • force: Optional[Bool]

    When set to True an Empty ActionRow will be ignored

Note

For more information about ActionRow’s visit the Discord-API Documentation.

Methodes¶

sendable(): Dict

Makes the ActionRow sendable to discord.

disable_all_buttons()

Disable all objects’s of type discord.Button in this ActionRow.

return

discord.ActionRow

disable_all_buttons_if(check: Union[Bool, Callable], **kwargs)()

Disable all discord.Button in this ActionRow if the passed check True.

Parameters

  • check: Union[Bool, Callable]

    could be an bool or usually any Callable that returns an bool

  • **kwargs

    kwargs that should passed in to the check if it is an Callable

return

ActionRow

discord.Button(**kwargs)¶

Represents an Discord-Button

Note

For more information Discord-Button’s visit the Discord-API Documentation.

Attributes¶

label: str

The Text displayed in discord on the Button. Maximal lenght is 80 Chars.

custom_id: Union[str, int]

The custom_id discord send us when a User press the Button. The max. lenght of this is 100.

style: Union[ButtonColor, ButtonStyle, Any[1, 2, 3, 4, 5]]

The Style of the Button.

Note

To get more infos about the styles visit the Discord-API Documentation.

emoji: Optional[Union[discord.PartialEmoji, discord.Emoji, str]]

The Emoji that will be displayed on the left side of the Button.

url: Optional[str]

The url the Button includes

Note

if you set this, the style will automaticly set to ButtonStyle.Link_Button

Warning

You cant pass an custom_id and a url beacuse discord dont send anything when clicking on an URL-Button so it dont accept both; url/ButtonStyle.Link_Button and custom_id!

disabled: Bool

Whether the Button is disabled; defauld False.

Methodes¶

disable_if() Disable the Button if the passed check returns True.

  • check: typing.Union[bool, typing.Callable]

    Could be an bool or usually any Callable that returns an bool

  • **kwargs: Any[SupportsIndex]

    Arguments that should passed in to the check if it is an Callable

return

discord.Button

set_color_if() Sets the Color(Style) of an discord.Button to the provided color if the passed check returns True.

  • check: could be an bool or usaly any Callable that returns an bool

  • color: the Color(Style) that should set if the check returns True

  • **kwargs: kwargs that should passed in to the check if it is an Callable

return

discord.Button
